data.title: Office of the New York State Comptroller
data.meta_description: Retirement Online gives NYSLRS members, retirees and beneficiaries an easy and secure way to review their benefits and do business with NYSLRS in real time.
data.text:
Overview

Now, it’s easier than ever to do business with NYSLRS.

Retirement Online is the fastest way to conduct business with NYSLRS and helps you avoid calling or mailing in forms.

Instant access to information about your benefits

Convenient tools to make changes to your account

Quicker service when you submit your requests online

Retirement Online Hours of Availability

Mon, Wed & Fri: 7:00 am to 10:00 pm

Tue & Thu: 7:00 am to 6:00 pm

Sat & Sun: 6:00 am to 11:00 pm

Visit our Retirement Online sign in page for the most current online availability information. Over time, hours of availability will be expanded.

It’s safe to use Retirement Online.

Retirement Online has the same security safeguards used for online banking and other financial institutions. You will be asked a series of security questions while registering. The questions are provided by a trusted third party and are used to protect your identity.

About your web browser.

Retirement Online works best with Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome.

With Retirement Online, you can:

View your

benefit information

Instead of relying on your annual statement or calling our Contact Center, you can review up-to-date information about your account when it’s convenient for you.

Update your

contact information

Make sure you receive important benefit information. Use Retirement Online to update your contact information, including your email address, phone number and mailing address, at any time.

Receive an email notification for important documents

Be the first to know when your Member Annual Statement and other correspondence are ready to view in Retirement Online. Change your delivery preference to email instead of waiting to receive a printed copy in the mail.

View or update your

beneficiaries

It’s a good idea to keep your beneficiary designations up to date. You can view your beneficiary selections and submit changes instantly.

Apply

for a loan

If you are eligible to take out a loan against your NYSLRS membership contributions, you can see how much you can borrow, repayment options and if your loan will be taxable when you apply.

Buy back

past service credit

You can request credit for previous public employment and upload any supporting documentation.

Manage loan and

service credit payments

Need to pay back a loan or purchase service credit? You can adjust your payment amount or make a lump sum payment.

Estimate your

pension benefit

In just a few steps, you can estimate your pension benefit based on up-to-date account information, then save and print the estimate for your records.

Apply for

retirement

You can submit your retirement application and other retirement paperwork online without the hassle of mailing paper forms or having them notarized.

Creating an account is easy. Register now to get started, and in just a few minutes you’ll be using Retirement Online.

↑ Return to Top

Overview

Now, it’s easier than ever to do business with NYSLRS.

Retirement Online is the fastest way to conduct business with NYSLRS and helps you avoid calling or mailing in forms.

Instant access to information about your benefits

Convenient tools to make changes to your account

Quicker service when you submit your requests online

Retirement Online Hours of Availability

Mon, Wed & Fri: 7:00 am to 10:00 pm

Tue & Thu: 7:00 am to 6:00 pm

Sat & Sun: 6:00 am to 11:00 pm

Visit our Retirement Online sign in page for the most current online availability information. Over time, hours of availability will be expanded.

It’s safe to use Retirement Online.

Retirement Online has the same security safeguards used for online banking and other financial institutions. You will be asked a series of security questions while registering. The questions are provided by a trusted third party and are used to protect your identity.

About your web browser.

Retirement Online works best with Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome.

With Retirement Online, you can:

View benefit

payment information

Select the date you want to view (beginning with your January 2023 payment and going forward) to see your benefit payment pay stub, including monthly and year-to-date payment amounts and deductions.

Update your

contact information

Make sure you receive important benefit information. Use Retirement Online to update your contact information, including your email address, phone number and mailing address, at any time. You can also schedule an address change if you spend part of the year in a second home.

Manage your direct

deposit information

Direct deposit is the fast and secure way to receive your pension payment. Use Retirement Online to make updates to your banking information instead of sending in a form.

Receive an email notification for important documents

Be the first to know when your 1099-R, Retiree Annual Statement and other correspondence are ready to view in Retirement Online. Change your delivery preference to email instead of waiting to receive a printed copy in the mail.

View, save and

print your 1099-R

You can access your 1099-R Tax Form in Retirement Online, beginning with tax year 2023.

Update your

federal tax withholding

If you need to adjust the amount withheld from your pension, save time by changing your federal withholding in Retirement Online.

Generate a pension

income letter

Sometimes a business may ask you to verify your pension income, maybe for housing or as part of an application for the Home Energy Assistance Program (HEAP). Use Retirement Online to generate a pension verification letter any time you need one.

View or update

your beneficiaries

It’s a good idea to keep your death benefit beneficiaries up to date. You can view your beneficiary selections and submit changes instantly.

Creating an account is easy. Register now to get started, and in just a few minutes you’ll be using Retirement Online.

↑ Return to Top
